author: scottwilson
msg: Made proxy service path configurable; this enables switching to Shindig open proxy if desirable; for now this is handy as our whitelist proxy isn't handling images, just XML/JSON

author: scottwilson
msg: Support Google Gadgets using a shared instance key, and also URLEncoded URLs in the url= parameter

author: scottwilson
msg: Load OpenSocial properties into Context, and pass to Widget Service Manager from Servlet, rather than load each time inside Widget Service Manager

author: scottwilson
msg: Code tidying, javadoc, and some more unit tests
